file.original: Exercise Set Up and Test Field.htm

external-file.href: Exercise Set Up and Test Field.htm.skl

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Set Up and Test Field Permissions

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Set Up and Test Field Permissions

trans-unit.source: As the database administrator, you are responsible for setting up the field permissions. Before completing a full field permission setup, you decide to set up a test environment to ensure the field permissions are controlled as needed.

seg-source.mrk: As the database administrator, you are responsible for setting up the field permissions.
Before completing a full field permission setup, you decide to set up a test environment to ensure the field permissions are controlled as needed.

trans-unit.source: You first enter the database-wide access and Field Permission table to your user ID. You then complete settings to test the following scenarios:

seg-source.mrk: You first enter the database-wide access and Field Permission table to your user ID.
You then complete settings to test the following scenarios:

trans-unit.source: To test the individual user setup, grant only Description field modification access on the Item table to user SUSAN.

seg-source.mrk: To test the individual user setup, grant only Description field modification access on the Item table to user SUSAN.

trans-unit.source: To test the SUPER role setup, grant Item Tracking Code field and Description field modification access on the Item table.

seg-source.mrk: To test the SUPER role setup, grant Item Tracking Code field and Description field modification access on the Item table.

trans-unit.source: To test the User/Role setup, remove the Item Tracking Code modification access on the Item table to user SUSAN, who is a member of the SUPER role.

seg-source.mrk: To test the User/Role setup, remove the Item Tracking Code modification access on the Item table to user SUSAN, who is a member of the SUPER role.

trans-unit.source: After you enter all the settings, you test the scenarios.

seg-source.mrk: After you enter all the settings, you test the scenarios.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: Ensure that both users set up in this demonstration are assigned to the SUPER security role.

seg-source.mrk: Ensure that both users set up in this demonstration are assigned to the SUPER security role.

trans-unit.source: Enter Field Permissions

seg-source.mrk: Enter Field Permissions

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to enter field permissions:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to enter field permissions:

trans-unit.source: Login as NT.

seg-source.mrk: Login as NT.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|regulatory affairs > Administration > Field Permissions.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|regulatory affairs > Administration > Field Permissions.

trans-unit.source: On the first line, tab through all the fields to have all fields blank, except the Modification Allowed check box selected.

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, tab through all the fields to have all fields blank, except the Modification Allowed check box selected.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Type = User
  2. ID = NT
  3. Table ID = 5060475
  4. Modification Allowed = selected

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Type = User
• ID = NT
• Table ID = 5060475
• Modification Allowed = selected

trans-unit.source:
Go to the next line and enter the following to prevent all users from changing the Description field on the Item table:
  1. Table ID = 27
  2. Field No. = 3
  3. Modification Allowed = not selected

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter the following to prevent all users from changing the Description field on the Item table:
• Table ID = 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Field No.
• Modification Allowed = not selected

trans-unit.source:
Go to the next line and enter the following to prevent all users from changing the Item Tracking Code field on the Item table:
  1. Table ID = 27
  2. Field No. = 6500
  3. Modification Allowed = not selected

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter the following to prevent all users from changing the Item Tracking Code field on the Item table:
• Table ID = 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Field No.
• Modification Allowed = not selected

trans-unit.source:
Go to the next line and enter the following to allow user SUSAN to change the Description field on the Item table:
  1. Type = User
  2. ID = SUSAN
  3. Table ID = 27
  4. Field No. = 3
  5. Modification Allowed = selected

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter the following to allow user SUSAN to change the Description field on the Item table:
• Type = User
• ID = SUSAN
• Table ID = 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Field No.
• Modification Allowed = selected

trans-unit.source:
Go to the next line and enter the following to prevent user SUSAN from changing the Item Tracking Code field on the Item table:
  1. Type = User
  2. ID = SUSAN
  3. Table ID = 27
  4. Field No. = 6500
  5. Modification Allowed = not selected

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter the following to prevent user SUSAN from changing the Item Tracking Code field on the Item table:
• Type = User
• ID = SUSAN
• Table ID = 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Field No.
• Modification Allowed = not selected

trans-unit.source:
Go to the next line and enter the following to allow role SUPER to change the Description field on the Item table:
  1. Type = Role
  2. ID = SUPER
  3. Table ID = 27
  4. Field No. = 3
  5. Modification Allowed = selected

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter the following to allow role SUPER to change the Description field on the Item table:
• Type = Role
• ID = SUPER
• Table ID = 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Field No.
• Modification Allowed = selected

trans-unit.source:
Go to the next line and enter the following to allow role SUPER to change the Item Tracking Code field on the Item table:
  1. Type = Role
  2. ID = SUPER
  3. Table ID = 27
  4. Field No. = 6500
  5. Modification Allowed = selected

seg-source.mrk: Go to the next line and enter the following to allow role SUPER to change the Item Tracking Code field on the Item table:
• Type = Role
• ID = SUPER
• Table ID = 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList">Field No.
• Modification Allowed = selected

trans-unit.source: : Field Permissions with Item table restrictions/access

seg-source.mrk: : Field Permissions with Item table restrictions/access

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Field Permissions page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Field Permissions page.

trans-unit.source: Test Field Permissions for User SUSAN

seg-source.mrk: Test Field Permissions for User SUSAN

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to ensure that user SUSAN can change the Description field but not the Item Tracking Code field on the Item Card:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to ensure that user SUSAN can change the Description field but not the Item Tracking Code field on the Item Card:

trans-unit.source: Login as SUSAN.

seg-source.mrk: Login as SUSAN.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Items (on the Home button).

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Items (on the Home button).

trans-unit.source: Locate item Q-20005 and open the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: Locate item Q-20005 and open the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: Change the value in the Description field to “Zinc Chloride”.

seg-source.mrk: Change the value in the Description field to “Zinc Chloride”.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The Item Card closes and the description is changed.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The Item Card closes and the description is changed.

trans-unit.source: Reopen the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: Reopen the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: : Description field changed on Item Card

seg-source.mrk: : Description field changed on Item Card

trans-unit.source: Expand the Item Tracking FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Item Tracking FastTab.

trans-unit.source: In the Item Tracking Code field, enter LOTALL.

seg-source.mrk: In the Item Tracking Code field, enter LOTALL.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The following message appears that the user does not have permission to modify the field.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The following message appears that the user does not have permission to modify the field.

trans-unit.source: : Field change permission error

seg-source.mrk: : Field change permission error

trans-unit.source:
Click Yes to discard the change.
The Item Card closes and the Item Tracking Code field is not changed.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to discard the change.
The Item Card closes and the Item Tracking Code field is not changed.

trans-unit.source: Reopen the Item Card and review the Item Tracking Code field.

seg-source.mrk: Reopen the Item Card and review the Item Tracking Code field.

trans-unit.source: : Item Tracking Code field unchanged on Item Card

seg-source.mrk: : Item Tracking Code field unchanged on Item Card

trans-unit.source: Close the Item Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Item Card page.

trans-unit.source: Test Field Permissions for User NT

seg-source.mrk: Test Field Permissions for User NT

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to ensure that user NT can change the Description field and the Item Tracking Code field on the Item Card:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to ensure that user NT can change the Description field and the Item Tracking Code field on the Item Card:

trans-unit.source: Login as NT.

seg-source.mrk: Login as NT.

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Items (on the Home button).

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Items (on the Home button).

trans-unit.source: Locate item Q-20005 and open the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: Locate item Q-20005 and open the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: Change the value in the Description field to “Zinc Chlorid”.

seg-source.mrk: Change the value in the Description field to “Zinc Chlorid”.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The Item Card closes and the description is changed.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The Item Card closes and the description is changed.

trans-unit.source: Reopen the Item Card.

seg-source.mrk: Reopen the Item Card.

trans-unit.source: : Description field changed on Item Card

seg-source.mrk: : Description field changed on Item Card

trans-unit.source: Expand the Item Tracking FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Item Tracking FastTab.

trans-unit.source: In the Item Tracking Code field, enter LOTALL.

seg-source.mrk: In the Item Tracking Code field, enter LOTALL.

trans-unit.source:
Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The Item Card closes and the Item Tracking Code field is changed.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Card page.
The Item Card closes and the Item Tracking Code field is changed.

trans-unit.source: Reopen the Item Card and review the Item Tracking Code field.

seg-source.mrk: Reopen the Item Card and review the Item Tracking Code field.

trans-unit.source: : Item Tracking Code field changed on Item Card

seg-source.mrk: : Item Tracking Code field changed on Item Card

trans-unit.source: Close the Item Card page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Item Card page.
